gemini.instruction:
Generate a comprehensive 'Consolidated Technical Debt Resolution Report' for TD-109 (Sacred Sequence Compliance), TD-110 (Phantom Tax Fix), and TD-115 (Tick 1 -99,680 Leak). 

Focus on:
1. Proof of resolution: How initialization reordering eliminated the Tick 1 leak.
2. Architectural Purity: How converting Government/Education spending to deferred Transactions and using SystemEffectsManager handlers enforced the Sacred Sequence.
3. Financial Integrity: Confirmation that all fixes maintain zero-sum stability as per the Gold Standard (WO-016).

Output should be saved to design/gemini_output/CONSOLIDATED_RESOLUTION_REPORT.md.

final_integrity_verification.instruction: Run scripts/trace_leak.py to verify that the Tick 1 leak (-99,680) is resolved and the Sacred Sequence for government spending is functioning. If any anomalies (hangs, money supply delta > 1.0, agent deactivation) are detected, perform a root cause analysis. Reference design/handover/walkthrough.md.
final_integrity_verification.title: Final Integrity Trace & Analysis
